name: Swappa.com - Dark Style
description: THIS STYLE IS NO LONGER BEING UPDATED ON THIS SITE. TO CONTINUE TO RECEIVE UPDATES, PLEASE INSTALL THE STYLE FROM THE GITHUB REPO. Just a simple theme to make the Swappa.com website dark. Colors can be customized in the first few lines of the style.
additional_info: 2019-11-05: This style has been moved to GitHub. 2018-12-10: Minor update to theme some additional green elements. 2018-10-23: Initial release
